Articles.Content:
Made using the [Cart/Moon buggy](http://www.kerbalspaceprogram.net/cart-moon-buggy), [Kosmos Space Station Parts Pack V3](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=7178.0), [Damned Robotics](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10662.0) and [Modular Missile Pack](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4886.0).

Its a kind of kerbalized Katyusha.

Jeb won a years supply of missiles in a local colouring contest.

So he allocated all of KSC\'s resources to exploring ways of using as many missiles as possible.

> 
> ![screenshot15r.png](http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/7881/screenshot15r.png)
> 
> ![screenshot16sd.png](http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/221/screenshot16sd.png)
> 
> ![screenshot17af.png](http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/2511/screenshot17af.png)
> 
> ![screenshot18s.png](http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2659/screenshot18s.png)
> 
> 

Then Jeb had an idea

> 
> ![screenshot19h.png](http://img715.imageshack.us/img715/930/screenshot19h.png)
> 
> ![screenshot20e.png](http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/8894/screenshot20e.png)
> 
> ![screenshot23o.png](http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/1171/screenshot23o.png)
> 
> 

And another one!

> 
> ![screenshot24t.png](http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/4836/screenshot24t.png)
> 
> ![screenshot25i.png](http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/7875/screenshot25i.png)
> 
> 

And the \'ideas\' kept flowing..

> 
> ![screenshot26.png](http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/4940/screenshot26.png)
> 
> ![screenshot27y.png](http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/7142/screenshot27y.png)
> 
> ![screenshot31s.png](http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/4152/screenshot31s.png)
> 
> ![screenshot30j.png](http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/6317/screenshot30j.png)
> 
> Jeb liked this try especially
> 
> ![screenshot29q.png](http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/7330/screenshot29q.png)
> 
> 

The landing legs were aesthetic at first, but later on they were absolutely necessary.
